content: In the Marvel Universe, what fictional metal is most associated with Wolverine and his retractable claws?

In the Marvel Universe, the fictional metal most associated with Wolverine and his retractable claws is Adamantium. This virtually indestructible metal was bonded to Wolverine's skeleton and used to create his iconic claws, which extend from his hands upon his command. The combination of Adamantium and his mutant healing powers makes Wolverine one of the most formidable characters in the Marvel Universe.
